name: Wide Guard
effect: Reaction. Shield Move. Reduce the damage the User and Allies would take from 'All Foes' or 'Area' moves by 3. Reduce minimum damage taken by the User and Allies to 1 unless resisted. Prevent all secondary effects that would trigger on the User and Allies by guarded moves.
description: The user provides shelter for its allies, spreading itself out to protect from spread attacks.
